mapper.select: SELECT f.follow_up_id, f.customer_id, f.contact_id, ct.name AS contact_name, f.type, f.content, f.follow_time, f.next_follow_time, f.create_user_id, u.realname AS create_user_name, f.create_time FROM crm_follow_up f LEFT JOIN crm_contact ct ON f.contact_id = ct.contact_id LEFT JOIN manager_user u ON f.create_user_id = u.user_id WHERE f.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY f.follow_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crm_follow_up WHERE create_user_id = #{userId} AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM follow_time) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM follow_time) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE)
